mapper.update:
update ti_organization
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgstyle = #{orgstyle,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgcode = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

orgfax = #{orgfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mainleader = #{mainleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgmark = #{orgmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where organizationid = #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ti_organization set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orgstyle = #{orgstyle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgcode = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgtypeid = #{orgtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgaddress = #{orgaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgphone = #{orgphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgfax = #{orgfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainleader = #{mainleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgmark = #{orgmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where organizationid = #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
